data.message: Mr Mathers I hope just coz u a celbrity thats not stopping you replying to us human people here,....dont like the word fan..it alienates me from you and I dont like celebs that never respond..take note! You wanna stay in with the norms!! Us lowly normal people...Talk to us individually like normal people would. You Alienate yourself otherwise. And its a bit UP oneself. The so called celebs i like for a better word...are the ones who talk to me as a normal person not ignore...And YOU of all folk..Stan Video! you were making out you write back! Well heres yer chance again write back to me!
